instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MacBook pro 820-3787-A
threads.message:
the macbook start normal untel i put the password stay 1 min and restart with black screen
if i turn it off and start it again the mac work normaly and after 1 min repeat the problem.
i change the pasta under the heatsink but nothing change.
i dont know from where can i start to measure in this setuation??

threads.title: MacBook pro 820-3787-A
threads.message:
if the macbook stay at the first screen that ask about password , stay work without restart
i change the ssd but the same problem

threads.title: MacBook pro 820-3787-A
threads.message:
Probably GPU issue problem.
Install gfxcardstatus and switch to iGPU and check if stays on more time.
Also try starting in safe mode.
ASD can also report some errors; OS version recommended to test discrete GPU.

If problem persists under Intel graphics, then you can have FDMF6808 issue...
